com.yantra.yfs.japi.ue

Interface YFSBeforeSendReturnReleaseToDCSUE


  • public interface YFSBeforeSendReturnReleaseToDCSUE

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      org.w3c.dom.Document beforeSendReturnReleaseToDCS(YFSEnvironment env, org.w3c.dom.Document inXML)
      This user exit is called by 'sendReturnReleaseToDCS' API.

    • Method Detail

      • beforeSendReturnReleaseToDCS

        org.w3c.dom.Document beforeSendReturnReleaseToDCS(YFSEnvironment env,
                                                  org.w3c.dom.Document inXML)
                                           throws com.yantra.yfs.japi.YFSUserExitException
        This user exit is called by 'sendReturnReleaseToDCS' API. The user exit will be called before every insert of RMAHDR, RMADTL and RMACMT record into WMS interface table. The output XML of the user exit has "InterfaceData" and "Action" attributes. Valid values for Action are "Append" and "None". When Action is Append, the InterfaceData will be appended to the system formatted interface data. And, when Action is None, the system formatted interface data will be used as is.
        The lengths of the system formatted interface data is
        for 'RMAHDR' record type - 529
        for 'RMADTL' record type - 150
        for 'RMACMT' record type - 129

        To code custom user exits, implement the method in this interface. The system calls the methods in your class. If this method gives any exception, the current transaction is rolled back.

        Precondition:
        This user exit is called unconditionally.
        Postcondition:
        Configuration Required for Backward Compatibility:
        N/A.
        Parameters:
        env - Environment handle returned by the createEnvironment() API. This is required for the user exit to either raise errors or access environment information.
        inXML - contains details of the record being inserted in to WMS. For more information, see the associated XML input and DTD input files.
        Returns:
        outXML See corresponding XML and DTD formats.

        Throws:
        YFSUserExitException - This exception is thrown whenever any system errors that the application cannot handle are encountered. The transaction is cancelled and changes are rolled back.
        com.yantra.yfs.japi.YFSUserExitException
